channel.title: Evan Rachel Wood on 无关紧要的宇宙
channel.description: Recent content in Evan Rachel Wood on 无关紧要的宇宙

item.title: Evan Rachel Wood Says She Isn’t Returning for ‘Practical Magic 2’: “I Was Told They Are Recasting”
item.description: Sandra Bullock and Nicole Kidman are coming back for the sequel, and on Friday, it was announced that Dianne Wiest and Stockard Channing will reprise their roles as the Owens aunts.

item.title: Evan Rachel Wood Says She Isn’t Returning for ‘Practical Magic 2’: “I Was Told They Are Recasting”
